Overlord.en: Critical fixes to Adobe's most recent updates. Required to continue transferring shape data between Ai and Ae.

Timelord.en: Critical fixes to Adobe's most recent updates. Required to continue transferring shape data between Ai and Ae.

Anubis.en:
Bug fixes

Updates are now possible in the panel

Added

  • Version update notification in panel
  • Metadata property stores the path to the project file (visible in Bridge)

Changed

  • All Ae output modules now supported if not compressing
  • Removed the _anubis at the end of file name if rendering .mp4 from Ae

Fixed

  • Folder picker opening twice
  • Folder names with `x` replaced with comp size

Rubberhose3.en:
RubberPins has returned

It took us a while to figure out the best way to make it feel right, but Puppet Pins now work really well with Rubberhose 3.

Added

  • New RubberPins button under the Build group
  • Korean language support

Fixed

  • Essential properties inside of groups would break EGP to Rig
  • Reduce warning when opening finder
  • SHIFT key was unresponsive in RubberRig
  • Support preference when non-separated dimensions

Rubberhose2.en:
Final build for v2

Rubberhose lives on in v3. Rubberhose 3
